lead_paragraph: Candace Parker received the Honda-Broderick Cup as the nation’s top female college athlete. Parker led Tennessee to its second consecutive N.C.A.A. title in April, then was drafted No. 1 by the Los Angeles Sparks.
snippet: Candace Parker received the Honda-Broderick Cup as the nation’s top female college athlete. Parker led Tennessee to its second consecutive N.C.A.A. title in April, then was drafted No. 1 by the Los Angeles Sparks.
